items.title: North East England set for billions in investment and thousands of jobs as UK and US ink tech partnership
items.raw_excerpt: The government has announced the creation of an AI Growth Zone in the North East, set to generate more than 5,000 new jobs and attract up to £30 billion in private investment.

title_i18n.en: North East England set for billions in investment and thousands of jobs as UK and US ink tech partnership
title_i18n.zh: 英格兰东北部将因英美科技合作获得数十亿投资和数千就业岗位。
title_i18n.es: El noreste de Inglaterra se prepara para recibir miles de millones en inversión y miles de empleos tras la firma de una asociación tecnológica entre el Reino Unido y Estados Unidos.

excerpt_i18n.en: The government has announced the creation of an AI Growth Zone in the North East, set to generate more than 5,000 new jobs and attract up to £30 billion in private investment.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 政府宣布在东北部设立人工智能增长区，预计将创造超过5000个新工作岗位，吸引高达300亿英镑的私人投资。
excerpt_i18n.es: El gobierno ha anunciado la creación de una Zona de Crecimiento de IA en el Noreste, que generará más de 5.000 nuevos empleos y atraerá hasta 30.000 millones de libras en inversión privada.

items.title: Sam Altman says ChatGPT will stop talking about suicide with teens
items.raw_excerpt: On Tuesday, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said that the company was attempting to balance privacy, freedom, and teen safety - principles that, he admitted, were in conflict. His blog post came hours before a Senate hearing focused on examining the harm of AI chatbots, held by the subcommittee on crime and counterterrorism and featuring some […]

title_i18n.en: Sam Altman says ChatGPT will stop talking about suicide with teens
title_i18n.zh: 山姆·奥特曼表示ChatGPT将停止与青少年讨论自杀话题。
title_i18n.es: Sam Altman afirma que ChatGPT dejará de hablar sobre el suicidio con adolescentes.

excerpt_i18n.en: On Tuesday, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said that the company was attempting to balance privacy, freedom, and teen safety - principles that, he admitted, were in conflict. His blog post came hours before a Senate hearing focused on examining the harm of AI chatbots, held by the subcommittee on crime and counterterrorism and featuring some […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 周二，OpenAI首席执行官萨姆·奥尔特曼表示，公司正努力在隐私、自由和青少年安全之间寻求平衡——他承认这些原则存在冲突。他的博文发布几小时后，参议院听证会将重点讨论
excerpt_i18n.es: El martes, el director ejecutivo de OpenAI, Sam Altman, declaró que la empresa intentaba equilibrar la privacidad, la libertad y la seguridad de los adolescentes, principios que, admitió, estaban en conflicto. Su publicación en el blog llegó horas antes de una audiencia en el Senado centrada en

items.title: Microsoft trumps Google with $30 billion investment in the UK
items.raw_excerpt: Microsoft is announcing that it’s investing £22 billion (around $30 billion) in the UK to help support AI infrastructure and ongoing operations from 2025 through 2028. The investment includes $15 billion in capital expenditures to build a supercomputer to support AI demand and adoption. “This will account for more than two-thirds of the tech sector’s […]

title_i18n.en: Microsoft trumps Google with $30 billion investment in the UK
title_i18n.zh: 微软以300亿英镑投资英国，超越谷歌。
title_i18n.es: Microsoft supera a Google con una inversión de 30.000 millones de dólares en el Reino Unido.

excerpt_i18n.en: Microsoft is announcing that it’s investing £22 billion (around $30 billion) in the UK to help support AI infrastructure and ongoing operations from 2025 through 2028. The investment includes $15 billion in capital expenditures to build a supercomputer to support AI demand and adoption. “This will account for more than two-thirds of the tech sector’s […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 微软宣布将在2025至2028年间向英国投资220亿英镑（约300亿美元），用于支持人工智能基础设施建设和持续运营。此项投资包含150亿美元的资本支出。
excerpt_i18n.es: Microsoft anuncia que invertirá 22.000 millones de libras (alrededor de 30.000 millones de dólares) en el Reino Unido para ayudar a respaldar la infraestructura de IA y las operaciones en curso desde 2025 hasta 2028. La inversión incluye 15.000 millones de dólares en gastos de capital.

items.title: Launch HN: Rowboat (YC S24) – Open-source IDE for multi-agent systems
items.raw_excerpt: Hi HN! We are Arjun, Ramnique, and Akhilesh, the founders of Rowboat ( https://www.rowboatlabs.com ), an AI-assisted IDE for building and managing multi-agent systems with a copilot. Using Rowboat, you can build both deterministic automation agents (e.g. automatically summarizing emails) and more agentic systems (e.g. a meeting prep assistant or a customer support bot). Here are some examples: - Meeting-prep assistant: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KZTP4xZM2DY - Customer support assistant: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xfo-OfgOl8w - Gmail and Reddit assistant: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6r7P4Vlcn2g Rowboat is open-source ( https://github.com/rowboatlabs/rowboat ) and has a growing community. We first launched it on Show HN a few months ago ( https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=43

title_i18n.en: Launch HN: Rowboat (YC S24) – Open-source IDE for multi-agent systems
title_i18n.zh: HN发布：Rowboat（YC S24）——多智能体系统的开源集成开发环境
title_i18n.es: Lanzamiento HN: Rowboat (YC S24) – IDE de código abierto para sistemas multiagente

excerpt_i18n.en: Hi HN! We are Arjun, Ramnique, and Akhilesh, the founders of Rowboat ( https://www.rowboatlabs.com ), an AI-assisted IDE for building and managing multi-agent systems with a copilot. Using Rowboat, you can build both deterministic automation agents (e.g. automatically summarizing emails) and more agentic systems (e.g. a meeting prep assistant or a customer support bot). Here are some examples: - Meeting-prep assistant: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KZTP4xZM2DY - Customer support assistant: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xfo-OfgOl8w - Gmail and Reddit assistant: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6r7P4Vlcn2g Rowboat is open-source ( https://github.com/rowboatlabs/rowboat ) and has a growing community. We first launched it on Show HN a few months ago ( https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=43
excerpt_i18n.zh: 大家好，我们是Rowboat（https://www.rowboatlabs.com）的联合创始人Arjun、Ramnique和Akhilesh。Rowboat是一款AI辅助集成开发环境，通过智能编程助手帮助用户构建和管理多智能体系统。使用Rowboat，您既可以开发独立
excerpt_i18n.es: ¡Hola HN! Somos Arjun, Ramnique y Akhilesh, fundadores de Rowboat ( https://www.rowboatlabs.com ), un IDE asistido por IA para construir y gestionar sistemas multiagente con un copiloto. Con Rowboat, puedes crear tanto det

items.title: Streamline access to ISO-rating content changes with Verisk rating insights and Amazon Bedrock
items.raw_excerpt: In this post, we dive into how Verisk Rating Insights, powered by Amazon Bedrock, large language models (LLM), and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), is transforming the way customers interact with and access ISO ERC changes.

title_i18n.en: Streamline access to ISO-rating content changes with Verisk rating insights and Amazon Bedrock
title_i18n.zh: 利用Verisk评级洞察和Amazon Bedrock简化ISO评级内容变更的访问流程。
title_i18n.es: Optimiza el acceso a cambios en contenidos de clasificación ISO con las perspectivas de calificación de Verisk y Amazon Bedrock.

excerpt_i18n.en: In this post, we dive into how Verisk Rating Insights, powered by Amazon Bedrock, large language models (LLM), and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), is transforming the way customers interact with and access ISO ERC changes.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 在这篇文章中，我们将探讨Verisk Rating Insights如何借助Amazon Bedrock、大型语言模型（LLM）和检索增强生成（RAG）技术，彻底改变客户与ISO ERC的互动及访问方式。
excerpt_i18n.es: En esta publicación, profundizamos en cómo Verisk Rating Insights, impulsado por Amazon Bedrock, modelos de lenguaje extenso (LLM) y Generación Aumentada por Recuperación (RAG), está transformando la forma en que los clientes interactúan y acceden a ISO ERC.

items.title: Unified multimodal access layer for Quora’s Poe using Amazon Bedrock
items.raw_excerpt: In this post, we explore how the AWS Generative AI Innovation Center and Quora collaborated to build a unified wrapper API framework that dramatically accelerates the deployment of Amazon Bedrock FMs on Quora’s Poe system. We detail the technical architecture that bridges Poe’s event-driven ServerSentEvents protocol with Amazon Bedrock REST-based APIs, demonstrate how a template-based configuration system reduced deployment time from days to 15 minutes, and share implementation patterns for protocol translation, error handling, and multi-modal capabilities.

title_i18n.en: Unified multimodal access layer for Quora’s Poe using Amazon Bedrock
title_i18n.zh: Quora的Poe平台采用亚马逊Bedrock的统一多模态接入层
title_i18n.es: Capa de acceso multimodal unificada para Poe de Quora mediante Amazon Bedrock

excerpt_i18n.en: In this post, we explore how the AWS Generative AI Innovation Center and Quora collaborated to build a unified wrapper API framework that dramatically accelerates the deployment of Amazon Bedrock FMs on Quora’s Poe system. We detail the technical architecture that bridges Poe’s event-driven ServerSentEvents protocol with Amazon Bedrock REST-based APIs, demonstrate how a template-based configuration system reduced deployment time from days to 15 minutes, and share implementation patterns for protocol translation, error handling, and multi-modal capabilities.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 在这篇文章中，我们将探讨AWS生成式AI创新中心与Quora如何合作构建统一的包装器API框架，显著加速了Amazon Bedrock基础模型在Quora的Poe系统上的部署。
excerpt_i18n.es: En esta publicación, exploramos cómo el Centro de Innovación de IA Generativa de AWS y Quora colaboraron para construir un marco de API unificado que acelera drásticamente el despliegue de los modelos fundacionales de Amazon Bedrock en el sistema Poe de Quora.
